# chimera_llm_proto

## Install

`pip install chimera_llm_proto`

## Usage


## Develop

Install pre-commit before commit

```
pip install pre-commit
pre-commit install
```

Install package locally

```
pip install -e .[test]
```

Run unit-test before PR, **ensure that new features are covered by unit tests**

```
pytest -v
```
